author: Dr15Jones
body:
The class CommonHcalNoiseRBXData used by HcalNoiseAlgo contained
three member data which were only conditionally set. The problem
was found by valgrind.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_5_X #9695 (original by @Dr15Jones).
title: Fixed uninitialized values used by HcalNoiseAlgo
